backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user auth, profiles, score submission, progression updates, and daily leaderboard management with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping AAA-upgrade requirements to associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all major frontend files including game logic, UI, assets, and rendering.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme definitions and color variables for light/dark modes with base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint preloading high‑resolution assets and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/api/useLeaderboards.ts: React Query hooks fetching daily and all‑time leaderboards from the canister.
frontend/src/api/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for loading and saving user profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication state, game flow, and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/assets/generatedAssets.ts: Centralized map of all generated high‑resolution game asset URLs.
frontend/src/auth/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with React Query cache reset.
frontend/src/auth/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx: Modal for first‑time profile creation with name input and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/GameHUD.tsx: Displays score, streak, coins, and survival time with pause/settings buttons and a formatted HUD layout.
frontend/src/components/GeneratedIcon.ts: Renders an icon from a sprite sheet by mapping icon names to coordinates and applying background positioning.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardPanel: Shows daily or all‑time leaderboards with tab switching, loading states, and styled rank entries.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides UI for toggling sound, reduced motion, and editing key bindings within a settings modal.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Simple sound effect generator using Web Audio oscillators for hit, coin, and powerup events.
frontend/src/game/balance/difficulty.ts: Computes dynamic difficulty values based on elapsed time, adjusting speed, spawn rate, and score multiplier.
frontend/src/game/fx/particles.ts: Creates radial particle bursts with randomized velocity, size, and color.
frontend/src/game/fx/screenShake.ts: Returns a shake intensity value for triggering screen shake effects.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based game renderer that loads assets, manages DPI scaling, handles input, and runs the game loop.
frontend/src/game/gameTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for game entities, particles, input, and the overall game state.
frontend/src/game/input/usePlayerInput.t: Tracks pointer and keyboard input to update normalized target movement coordinates based on settings.
frontend/src/game/renderer.ts: Handles rendering the game canvas, including parallax backgrounds, effects, particles, power‑ups and player movement smoothing.
frontend/src/game/rendererAssets.ts: Loads and caches game rendering assets like background, token, hazard and UI sprites.
frontend/src/game/useGameLoop.ts: Implements the main game loop with spawning, movement, collisions, scoring and state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication, identity loading, login handling and context state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query mutations for submitting scores and unlocking perks via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, typography, blur, shadows and premium UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/GameScreen.tsx: Renders the main game screen with canvas, HUD, pause menu and settings dialog, managing game state callbacks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingScreen.tsx: Landing screen component showing branding, login, settings, and buttons to start the game, open leaderboard, or open unlocks.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsScreen.tsx: Displays post‑game results, awards coins, submits scores to backend, and shows stats with restart and menu options.
frontend/src/progression/perks.ts: Defines the list of available perks, including IDs, descriptions, costs, icons, and types.
frontend/src/progression/UnlocksShop.tsx: UI for viewing and purchasing perks using earned coins, with validation and unlock actions.
Manages player progression in localStorage, including coins, best score, and unlocking perks with optional backend sync.
frontend/src/settings/settingsTypes.ts: Defines settings structures including sound, motion reduction, and key bindings with default values.
frontend/src/settings/useSettings.ts: Hook for loading, storing, and updating user settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, theme direction, image rework requirements, and a list of existing gameplay and UI features with versioning.
